name: gss_buffer_desc_struct
desc: The structure for a buffer descriptor that you use to exchange octet streams with many GSS-API functions.

items.name: var length: Int
items.desc: The number of bytes held in the buffer.

items.name: var value: UnsafeMutableRawPointer!
items.desc: A pointer to the bytes in the buffer.

items.name: init(length: Int, value: UnsafeMutableRawPointer!)
items.desc: Initialize a new buffer with the given array of elements.
